mapper.select: SELECT TA.AUTHORITY_DESCRIPTION FROM T_AUTHORITY TA,T_AUTHORITY_OPERATION TAO WHERE TA.AUTHORITY_DESCRIPTION IS NOT NULL AND TAO.AUTHORITY_ID = TA."ID" GROUP BY TA.AUTHORITY_DESCRIPTION
SELECT TA.* FROM T_ROLE_AUTHORITY TRA, T_AUTHORITY TA WHERE TRA.ROLE_ID=#{roleId} AND TRA.AUTHORITY_ID=TA.ID

SELECT T_AUTHORITY.* FROM T_USER, T_USER_ROLE, T_ROLE_AUTHORITY, T_MENU, T_AUTHORITY_MENU, T_AUTHORITY WHERE T_USER. ID = T_USER_ROLE.USER_ID AND T_USER_ROLE.ROLE_ID = T_ROLE_AUTHORITY.ROLE_ID AND T_ROLE_AUTHORITY.AUTHORITY_ID = T_AUTHORITY. ID AND T_ROLE_AUTHORITY.AUTHORITY_ID = T_AUTHORITY_MENU.AUTHORITY_ID AND T_MENU. ID = T_AUTHORITY_MENU.MENU_ID AND T_USER. ID = #{userId} AND T_MENU. ID = #{menuId}
SELECT DISTINCT TA.* FROM T_AUTHORITY TA, T_AUTHORITY_OPERATION TAO WHERE TA.AUTHORITY_DESCRIPTION IS NOT NULL AND TAO.AUTHORITY_ID = TA."ID" AND TA.AUTHORITY_STATUS = 1
